content.title: Design Development Training For Master Crafts Persons
content.details: The 'Design Development Training For Master Crafts Persons' Component of the 'Development of Handicrafts' Scheme by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry aims to enhance the skills of craftspersons in moulding and designing their traditional crafts. The objective is to make these crafts more appealing to customers and increase marketability. The training is expected to have a significant impact on the development of modern art and techniques in crafts, potentially introducing new crafts from other regions.
benefits: Travelling Allowances: To & Fro 2nd class (berth) train fare.
Course Fee: As prescribed will be paid to the Training Unit/Institution.
eligibility: The applicant should be a Craftsperson or Artisan.
The applicant should be from Puducherry.
The applicant should be carrying out the activity in their respective crafts for at least three years.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested applicant should take print of the prescribed format of the application form, fill in all mandatory fields, paste a passport-sized photograph, and attach copies of all mandatory documents. The completed application should be submitted to the Project Manager of the District Industries Centre.
documents_required: Proof of Craftsperson/Artisan status for at least three years.
Proof of Permanent Registration of the Unit with the Department of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry.

faqs.question: What is the primary objective of the 'Design Development Training For Master Crafts Persons' scheme?
faqs.answer: Enhancing the skills of craftspersons in moulding and designing their traditional crafts to increase market appeal.

faqs.question: How can craftspersons benefit financially under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Craftspersons are eligible for a monthly remuneration of ₹3,000, ₹1,000 for accommodation, and 2nd class train fare for traveling.

faqs.question: What does the scheme offer to the Training Unit/Institution in terms of financial support?
faqs.answer: The Training Unit/Institution receives payment for the course fee as prescribed.

faqs.question: How is the period of training determined for craftspersons?
faqs.answer: The period of training is determined as prescribed by the Training Unit/Institution.

faqs.question: What is the significance of the scheme in the context of modern art and craft techniques?
faqs.answer: The scheme aims to have a significant impact on the development of modern art and techniques in crafts, possibly introducing new crafts from other regions.

faqs.question: How does the scheme contribute to the marketability of traditional crafts?
faqs.answer: By enhancing craftspersons' skills, the scheme makes traditional crafts more appealing to customers, thereby increasing marketability.

faqs.question: Where can applicants find the necessary application forms for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Application forms can be downloaded from the official website at https://dic.py.gov.in/application-forms-download-area.

faqs.question: What financial support does the scheme provide for craftspersons' accommodation?
faqs.answer: Craftspersons are entitled to ₹1,000 per month for accommodation charges.

faqs.question: What is the role of the Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry, in the scheme?
faqs.answer: The department oversees the permanent registration of the unit and ensures the implementation of the training for craftspersons.

faqs.question: Where can individuals raise grievances related to the scheme?
faqs.answer: Grievances can be addressed through the Grievance Redressal Mechanism at https://industry.py.gov.in/grievance-redressal-mechanism.

faqs.question: What kind of crafts does the scheme focus on for design development training?
faqs.answer: The scheme focuses on enhancing skills in moulding and designing traditional crafts carried out by craftspersons.

faqs.question: How is the course fee for the training determined?
faqs.answer: The course fee is determined as prescribed by the Training Unit/Institution.
